episode: I completed a marathon which was something I never thought I would do.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I completed a marathon which was something I never thought I would do.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's amazing, congratulations!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thanks.  There was a lot of training required and real commitment beforehand.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I bet, it's a huge accomplishment, you must be really proud.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was.  I was raising money for charity as well which was also a good feeling.  For cancer research which has a close connection to friends and family.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That adds an extra layer of meaning, very admirable.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes and I completed below the time I wanted so it was a success.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Even better, beating your goal time is a great bonus!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I thought I could have gone better but I wanted a rest after running everyday for weeks.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You definitely earned the rest, your body must've been exhausted!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was getting more injuries as well.  Never got back to it since.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Burnout and injuries can be tough to bounce back from.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I do more walking now which doesn't get the impact injuries.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a great way to stay active while being easier on your body.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Walking alongside the river is really good with some wildlife sights.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Sounds peaceful and lovely, nice way to clear your mind.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I love the fresh air and outdoors.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: There's nothing like it, very rejuvenating!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Lots to be said in getting steps in.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Every step counts, right?
